name: SWEEPER (Nemnik (Timur Saifullin), be39na, sadcat23, Dima Dima)
name_original: SWEEPER (Nemnik (Timur Saifullin), be39na, sadcat23, Dima Dima)
description:
The main character works in an illegal organization. The main character's task is to collect taxes from those who refused to pay on their own.

Dynamic top-down shooter with neon-cyberpunk style. A variety of opponents, various abilities of the prosthesis of the protagonist, which can be improved.

This city has long been out of hand, many began to forget their place, which means that a good cleaning will not hurt. Can you become the best SWEEPER?

Music player controls:

Mouse wheel to change music.

Feel free to download demo and leave comments :)

Course project DDT&A team 2020 (ITMO University)
